mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM settlement WHERE projectId = #{projectId} AND settlementStatus = 'WAITING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM settlement WHERE projectId = #{projectId} AND settlementId = #{settlementId} AND settlementStatus = 'PAID'
mapper.update: UPDATE settlement SET settlementStatus = 'PAID', settlementDate = SYSDATE WHERE projectId = #{projectId} AND creatorId = #{creatorId} AND settlementId = #{settlementId} AND settlementStatus = 'WAITING'
mapper.select: SELECT c.creatorId, c.creatorName, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN s.settlementStatus = 'WAITING' THEN s.settlementAmount END), 0) AS waitingAmount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN s.settlementStatus = 'PAID' THEN s.settlementAmount END), 0) AS completedAmount, COALESCE(COUNT(CASE WHEN s.settlementStatus = 'PAID' THEN 1 END), 0) AS settledCount, c.bank, c.account FROM creator c LEFT JOIN settlement s ON c.creatorId = s.creatorId WHERE c.creatorId = #{creatorId} GROUP BY c.creatorId, c.creatorName, c.bank, c.account
SELECT SUM(totalAmount) FROM settlement WHERE creatorId =#{creatorId}
SELECT * FROM settlement WHERE creatorId = #{creatorId} ORDER BY settlementDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO settlement ( settlementId, projectId, creatorId, totalAmount, fee, settlementAmount, settlementDate, ${statusColumn}, refundAmount ) SELECT SETTLEMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, p.projectId, p.creatorId, NVL(paid.total_paid, 0) AS totalAmount, ROUND(NVL(paid.total_paid, 0) * #{feeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, 0) AS fee, NVL(paid.total_paid, 0) - ROUND(NVL(paid.total_paid, 0) * #{feeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, 0) AS settlementAmount, SYSDATE AS settlementDate, 'WAITING' AS ${statusColumn}, 0 AS refundAmount FROM project p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.projectId, SUM(pay.amount) AS total_paid FROM payment pay JOIN backing b ON b.backingId = pay.backingId JOIN backingDetail bd ON bd.backingId = b.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId WHERE pay.status = 'PAID' GROUP BY r.projectId ) paid ON paid.projectId = p.projectId WHERE p.endDate < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND (p.currAmount >= p.goalAmount OR p.projectStatus IN ('SUCCESS')) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM settlement s WHERE s.projectId = p.projectId AND s.${statusColumn} IN ('WAITING','PAID') )
